info.name: Prbal Services API - ServiceViewSet Complete
info.description: Comprehensive collection for all 13 ServiceViewSet endpoints with standardized responses format: {message, data, time, statusCode}

query.description: Filter by status: active, pending, inactive
Filter by currency: INR, USD, EUR, GBP
Search in name, description, location, tags
Order by: created_at, hourly_rate, min_hours, max_hours

{
    "name": "Professional Plumbing Service",
    "description": "Expert plumbing repairs and installations with 5+ years experience. Available for emergencies 24/7.",

        "emergency_rate": 750.00,

            "comprehensive_service": 1500.00
